EmailTemplate.name: Bid Rejection Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in a Tutoring Position
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Engagement__c.TutorFullName__c},
Thank you for applying for a Tutoring Position in {!Engagement__c.Subject__c} at {!Engagement__c.SchoolName__c}.
Unfortunately on this occasion your application has not been accepted, in most circumstances this is due to another applicant being more suited to this position.
Please keep an eye on the 'Apply for New Positions' tab in the Tutor Portal as a new position may become available near you soon.
Kind Regards,
The Tutor Trust Team
